title: Ireland
creator_credit: Dudley Productions, Irish Tourist Board and Dudley Warner
brief_description: A tourist film which shows glimpses of places to visit and points of interest all over Ireland. The film includes many examples of historic places and buildings, traditional life and customs and also its crafts and its sports.
